meanings.sent1: The uncoffined body lay peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The uncoffined remains were respectfully buried in the ground.
meanings.sent3: The uncoffined squirrel seemed to enjoy its freedom from confinement.
meanings.sent4: Her uncoffined thoughts wandered freely, unrestricted by boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The uncoffined image of the lone tree against the sky was hauntingly beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The uncoffined soldier was honored with a traditional burial ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The uncoffined deceased was laid to rest in a simple shroud.
meanings.sent3: The uncoffined cat seemed to prefer sleeping in open spaces.
meanings.sent4: His uncoffined dreams roamed wild and untamed in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The uncoffined shipwreck on the shore was a stark reminder of the sea's power.
